text: Jorge Matias (14 March 1957 - 27 June 2001) was a Portuguese equestrian. He competed in the individual jumping event at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2001 deaths Category:Portuguese male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Portugal Category:Equestrians at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Lisbon
title: Jorge Matias
